fields.title: The Hurt Business
fields.text: Movie Featuring legendary and up-and-coming MMA fighters, this documentary details the history of the brutal sport and the fighters' struggles and triumphs.

fields.title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
fields.text: Movie When a deal with the devil comes due, the immortal Doctor Parnassus must renegotiate the pact to save his daughter and right the wrongs of his past.

fields.title: The Inbetweeners
fields.text: TV Show This rib-tickling series follows four English lads as they try – and fail spectacularly – to navigate the wretched no-man's land of adolescence.

fields.title: The Incident
fields.text: Movie Two criminals race down a stairwell, a cop close behind. A bickering family begins a road trip. Their journeys will take far longer than expected.

fields.title: The Incredible Story of the Giant Pear
fields.text: Movie Sebastian the elephant and his feline friend Mithco sail on a gigantic peach to rescue Sunnytown's beloved mayor, who's stranded on a mysterious island.

fields.title: The Incredibles 2
fields.text: Movie When Elastigirl gets recruited for a high-profile crime-fighting mission, Mr. Incredible takes on his toughest assignment ever: full-time parenting.

fields.title: The Indian in the Cupboard
fields.text: Movie A boy receives a wooden cupboard, antique keys and an Iroquois warrior figurine for his birthday. The figurine comes to life overnight in the cabinet.

fields.title: The Informant!
fields.text: Movie While gathering evidence against his employer to help the FBI build a price-fixing case, Mark Whitacre begins to piece together a fantasy world.

fields.title: The Intent
fields.text: Movie After burgeoning criminal Gunz joins the increasingly violent TIC crew, the gang finds itself dealing with threats from all sides.

fields.title: The Intent 2: The Come Up
fields.text: Movie During a trip to Jamaica, a London gang targets a disloyal member who has been meeting with rivals. Meanwhile, an undercover cop stands among them.

fields.title: The Invention of Lying
fields.text: Movie In a world where no one fibs, a screenwriter gains fame and fortune – and maybe the girl of his dreams – by saying things that aren't true.

fields.title: The Investigator: A British Crime Story
fields.text: TV Show After 40 years of inconclusive evidence, renowned criminologist Mark Williams-Thomas re-examines a string of mysterious murders.

fields.title: The Invitation
fields.text: Movie A man accepts an invitation to a dinner party hosted by his ex-wife, an unsettling affair that reopens old wounds and creates new tensions.

fields.title: The Irish Mob
fields.text: TV Show This documentary crime series charts the rise of the Irish Mob in America, from urban immigrant poverty to political power and wealth.

fields.title: The Iron Lady
fields.text: Movie Margaret Thatcher, the first female prime minister of Britain, navigates a career destined to change the rules of leadership and politics.

fields.title: The Jack King Affair
fields.text: Movie This documentary explores a bold World War II operation in which an MI5 agent infiltrated a fascist network to intercept stolen documents.

fields.title: The Jaime Maussan Show
fields.text: TV Show Mexican journalist and UFO investigator Jaime Maussan travels the world collecting evidence and firsthand accounts of extraterrestrial phenomena.

fields.title: The Jane Austen Book Club
fields.text: Movie Six book club members find their lives resemble a modern-day version of Jane Austen's novels in this drama.

fields.title: The Jungle Book
fields.text: TV Show This animated series follows young Mowgli and his animal mentors Bagheera and Baloo, who do their best to protect him from fierce tiger Shere Khan.

fields.title: The Jungle School
fields.text: Movie An idealistic young woman travels to the jungles of Indonesia to teach literacy – and much more – to local children.

fields.title: The Keeping Hours
fields.text: Movie Years after the death of their only child and subsequent divorce, a couple discovers that their son's ghost continues to inhabit their former home.

fields.title: The Kindness Diaries
fields.text: TV Show Host Leon Logothetis travels the world with only a vintage motorbike and the kindness of strangers, which he pays back in unexpected, inspiring ways.

fields.title: The King's Speech
fields.text: Movie In this biographical drama, Britain's King George VI struggles with an embarrassing stutter until he seeks help from speech therapist Lionel Logue.

fields.title: The L Word
fields.text: TV Show This trailblazing series follows the tangled lives and ever-changing relationships among a close-knit group of lesbians who call Los Angeles home.

fields.title: The Lady in Dignity
fields.text: TV Show The wife of a corporate heir finds her luxurious life overturned by a mysterious woman who joins the household as a caregiver for her father-in-law.

fields.title: The Lake House
fields.text: Movie A lonely doctor begins writing letters to the frustrated architect who lives in her former home, only to discover that they're living two years apart.

fields.title: The Lamb
fields.text: Movie A big-dreaming donkey escapes his menial existence and befriends some free-spirited animal pals in this imaginative retelling of the Nativity Story.

fields.title: The Land of the Enlightened
fields.text: Movie In the rugged mountains of Afghanistan, armed bands of young boys survive by scavenging for old land mines, mining lapis lazuli and trading in opium.

fields.title: The Last Days of Chez Nous

fields.title: The Last Exorcism

fields.title: The Last Face
fields.text: Movie Savage civil war and a dispute over humanitarian assistance threaten to unravel a checkered romance between an aid director and a doctor.

fields.title: The Last Hangover

fields.title: The Last Man on the Moon

fields.title: The Last Resort

fields.title: The Last Whistle
fields.text: Movie After a star player dies during football practice, his coach’s career and reputation are on the line as he refuses to quit his win-at-all-costs style.

fields.title: The Legend of 420

fields.title: The Legend of Michael Mishra
fields.text: Movie After a life of crime, a notorious kidnapper tries to change his ways and turn over a new leaf to win the heart of the woman he loves.

fields.title: The Liar
fields.text: TV Show At the CARE detective agency, investigators see a lot of action but must always keep their cases secret, even when it affects their personal lives.

fields.title: The Little Hours
fields.text: Movie Life at a convent takes an unruly turn when three unconventionally opinionated nuns cross paths with a tempting new gardener.

fields.title: The Little Mermaid

fields.title: The Little Prince
fields.text: Movie When an overscheduled girl befriends an eccentric aviator, he regales her with tales about the adventures of an unusual boy who lives on an asteroid.

fields.title: The Lives of Others
fields.text: Movie As a secret police agent eavesdrops on a successful writer in East Germany in 1984, he becomes increasingly fascinated by the man's life and politics.

fields.title: The Lizzie Borden Chronicles
fields.text: TV Show Exonerated in the murder of her father and stepmother, Lizzie Borden takes on crime lords, detectives and other foes as she savors her new infamy.

fields.title: The Lobster

fields.title: The Lodgers
fields.text: Movie Twin siblings live under a curse in their ancestral home, but one of them is tempted to defy house rules, angering the spirits keeping them hostage.

fields.title: The Long Goodbye: The Kara Tippetts Story

fields.title: The Longest Yard

fields.title: The Longshots
fields.text: Movie When an 11-year-old girl becomes Pop Warner football's first female quarterback, she raises eyebrows – till she takes her team to the brink of glory.

fields.title: The Look of Silence
fields.text: Movie In a society terrorized into silence, the brother of a 1960s Indonesian genocide victim learns the identity of his murderers and confronts them.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
fields.text: Movie Aragorn is revealed as the heir to the ancient kings as he, Gandalf and the other members of the broken fellowship struggle to save Gondor.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
fields.text: Movie Frodo and Sam head to Mordor to destroy the One Ring of Power while Gimli, Legolas and Aragorn search for the orc-captured Merry and Pippin.

fields.title: The Love Guru
fields.text: Movie Raised on an ashram in India, a self-styled love guru returns to his native America to settle a romantic rivalry between two pro hockey players.

fields.title: The Lovers and the Despot

fields.title: The lynx
fields.text: Movie A priest's duties are tested when a young guerrilla asks for absolution while confessing his plans to murder a local man he believes is a traitor.

fields.title: The Mad Monk
fields.text: Movie To avoid punishment for his misdeeds, an arrogant god accepts a mission to reform three mortals on earth, where he must also contend with a demon.

fields.title: The Magic Pill
fields.text: Movie Doctors, farmers, chefs and others weigh in on the controversial ketogenic diet and its potential to eradicate common illnesses.

fields.title: The Making of Frozen Planet
fields.text: TV Show Documentary crew members brave Earth's most frigid regions to capture the majesty and mystery found in the chillier side of the animal kingdom.

fields.title: The Man Who Would Be Polka King
fields.text: Movie This irreverent documentary reveals how charming entertainer Jan Lewan bilked investors out of millions in a complicated investment scam.

fields.title: The Mask of Zorro
fields.text: Movie An aging Zorro passes the torch to a young successor, schooling him in discipline and training him to take up the sword against crooked officials.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.text: Movie A computer hacker learns that what most people perceive as reality is actually a simulation created by machines, and joins a rebellion to break free.

fields.title: The Matrix Reloaded
fields.text: Movie The crew must protect Zion, the last outpost still under human control, after it is pinpointed by the machines responsible for the Matrix.

fields.title: The Matrix Revolutions
fields.text: Movie The final installment in the Matrix trilogy finds an unconscious Neo trapped in a subway station in a zone between the Matrix and the machine world.

fields.title: The Mayo Clinic
fields.text: Movie A look at how a world-renowned medical institution prioritizes patients' needs and has adapted to healthcare's evolving demands for over 150 years.

fields.title: The Mayor
fields.text: Movie With the presidency in mind, the incumbent mayor of Seoul runs for an unprecedented third term – and will stop at nothing to keep his secrets hidden.

fields.title:
The Memphis Belle: A Story of a
Flying Fortress
fields.text: Movie This documentary centers on the crew of the B-17 Flying Fortress Memphis Belle as it prepares to execute a strategic bombing mission over Germany.

fields.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
fields.text: Movie A journalist latches onto an unbelievable story in Iraq when he meets Lyn, a man of mysterious origins who reveals he was a "warrior monk."

fields.title: The Messengers
fields.text: TV Show A group of strangers who are killed by a mysterious object soon come back to life and learn they have been chosen to prevent the apocalypse.

fields.title: The Mind of a Chef
fields.text: TV Show Producer and narrator Anthony Bourdain explores the creative processes of international celebrity chefs to learn what fuels their culinary artistry.

fields.title: The Minimighty Kids
fields.text: TV Show Some have big feet or a sniffly nose, others are clumsy or too sweaty – but these kids soon discover their mini problems can become superpowers.

fields.title: The Ministry of Time
fields.text: TV Show Three officers from different eras work for a secret agency guarding Spain's past from time-traveling intruders trying to manipulate history.

fields.title: The Model
fields.text: Movie Danish teen Emma moves to Paris hoping to become a top model, but her dreams soon unravel when her affair with photographer Shane turns obsessive.

fields.title: The Monster
fields.text: Movie A troubled mother-daughter relationship faces the ultimate test when the duo’s broken-down car leaves them trapped within reach of a vicious creature.

fields.title: The Monster of Mangatiti
fields.text: Movie Real events are dramatized in the unthinkable story of a resilient teenager held prisoner by a seasoned predator on a remote farm in the 1980s.

fields.title: The Mortified Guide
fields.text: TV Show Brave people get onstage to read hilarious and humiliating tales of gawky teenage love, family dysfunction and other stories from their younger years.

fields.title: The Most Beautiful Hands of Delhi
fields.text: TV Show A stalled career, failed marriage and receding hairline drive a middle-aged Swedish man to try to revitalize his life by visiting India.

fields.title: The Muppets
fields.text: Movie When the Muppets learn that their beloved theater is slated for demolition, the gang reunite to raise the $10 million they need to save it.

fields.title: The Murder Detectives
fields.text: TV Show This series tracks the ups and downs of an 18-month investigation into the 2014 stabbing murder of teenager Nicholas Robinson in Bristol, England.

fields.title: The Music of Silence
fields.text: Movie Based on the autobiography by tenor Andrea Bocelli, this musical biopic chronicles his life from his bumpy childhood to his meteoric rise to fame.

fields.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear
fields.text: Movie Bumbling cop Frank Drebin is out to foil the big boys in the energy industry, who intend to suppress technology that would put them out of business.

fields.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
fields.text: Movie Hapless cop Frank Drebin causes more problems than he solves while trying to stop a deadly plot involving Queen Elizabeth II.

fields.title: The Natural
fields.text: Movie A gifted baseball player whose life has taken some startling turns becomes a 35-year-old rookie who helps a cellar-dwelling team get back in the game.

fields.title: The Negro Soldier
fields.text: Movie This documentary urged African Americans to enlist and join in the effort to be part of America's continuing fight in World War II.

fields.title: The Netflix Afterparty
fields.text: TV Show Hosts David Spade, Fortune Feimster and London Hughes welcome guests from the newest and biggest Netflix titles for fun conversations, skits and more.

fields.title: The New Romantic
fields.text: Movie Fed up with dating and debt, a naïve college senior documents her experience of being with a wealthy, older man for a gonzo journalism grant.

fields.title: The Nineties
fields.text: TV Show This U.S.-focused series dives into the cultural and political changes that swept the last decade of the 20th century. Executive produced by Tom Hanks.

fields.title: The NSU-Complex
fields.text: Movie For 13 years, the underground neo-Nazi organization NSU eluded German police while planting bombs, robbing banks and killing immigrants at random.

fields.title: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
fields.text: Movie When her late mother gifts her a key, Clara embarks on a dreamlike journey full of fantasy and conflict in this retelling of the holiday classic.

fields.title: The Office (U.S.)
fields.text: TV Show This hit comedy chronicles the foibles of disgruntled office workers – led by deluded boss Michael Scott – at the Dunder Mifflin paper company.

fields.title: The One I Love
fields.text: Movie Confronted with the potential end of their marriage, Ethan and Sophie take off for a weekend together, hoping to negotiate their future.

fields.title: The Only Mother To You All
fields.text: Movie Raising her large family alone after her husband's death, Ina searches for work and finally lands the most unlikely job: president of the Philippines.

fields.title: The Other Guys
fields.text: Movie New York cops Allen and Terry toil in obscurity as lowly desk jockeys until a big break finally gives them a chance to tackle real police work.

fields.title: The Parole Officer
fields.text: Movie After witnessing a murder, Simon Garden is framed – and the only evidence that proves his innocence is a videotape locked inside a bank vault.

fields.title: The Pass
fields.text: Movie The lives and careers of two professional soccer players are profoundly impacted by a single moment of intimacy that took place between them.

fields.title: The Peacemaker
fields.text: Movie After terrorists trigger a nuclear blast in Russia, a U.S. Special Forces intelligence agent and a nuclear weapons expert come to the rescue.

fields.title: The Pelican Brief
fields.text: Movie When law student Darby Shaw theorizes about the assassinations of two Supreme Court justices, she is put in danger and turns to a reporter for help.

fields.title: The Perfect Day
fields.text: Movie French soccer fans, celebrities and athletes retrace the exhilarating events of July 12, 1998, as France earned a historic win in the World Cup final.

fields.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
fields.text: Movie A shy freshman struggling with depression deals with his best friend's suicide and his first love in this engaging coming-of-age tale.

fields.title: The Phantom of the Opera
fields.text: Movie In 1870, a disfigured recluse roams beneath a Parisian opera house and takes under his wing a young soprano, with whom a love triangle develops.

fields.title: The Physician
fields.text: Movie A medical apprentice in 11th-century Persia disguises himself as a Jew to study at a school that does not admit Christians.

fields.title: The Pink Panther
fields.text: Movie Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a world-famous soccer coach and catch the thief who stole his priceless diamond ring.

fields.title: The Pirate Fairy
fields.text: Movie In this spritely tale, Tinker Bell and her friends set out to find free-spirited fairy Zarina after she makes off with some precious Blue Pixie Dust.

fields.title: The Pirates of Somalia
fields.text: Movie An aspiring journalist travels to Somalia in hopes of making a name for himself by covering dangerous pirates and hijackers.

fields.title: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
fields.text: Movie An egotistical pirate captain strives to win the Pirate of the Year Award, but to snag the coveted prize, he'll have to outwit his dreaded rivals.

fields.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
fields.text: Movie A violent confrontation between a motorcycle-riding bank robber and a rookie cop spirals into a tense generational feud.

fields.title: The Plan
fields.text: Movie After being sent to a remote prison, three young men suffer under the watchful eye of their jailer and make a meticulous plan to escape.

fields.title: The Player
fields.text: Movie To save his father’s company from bankruptcy, a rich, spoiled playboy is forced to wed a no-nonsense woman, who's just as unhappy to be marrying him.

fields.title: The Polar Express
fields.text: Movie In this warm-hearted tale, a young boy's faith in the holiday spirit is revived after he makes his way by train to the North Pole on Christmas Eve.

fields.title: The Power of Grayskull: The Definitive History of He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
fields.text: Movie This colorful documentary explores the origins and impact of He-Man, a character whose power stretched well beyond a toy line and children's TV show.

fields.title: The President's Barber
fields.text: Movie The personal barber to the president, as well as his wife and only son, get tangled in the political chaos that gripped South Korea in the late 1900s.

fields.title: The Prince
fields.text: Movie A former Mafia hit man living quietly as a mechanic veers back into his old world after his daughter is abducted and faces an old foe in New Orleans.

fields.title: The Prince & Me
fields.text: Movie A hardworking Wisconsin college student falls for her arrogant yet charming classmate, unaware that he's a Danish prince attending school incognito.

fields.title: The Princess and the Frog
fields.text: Movie In New Orleans during the Jazz Age, a beautiful girl named Tiana has a fateful encounter with frog prince who desperately wants to be human again.

fields.title: The Prison
fields.text: Movie A cop-turned-convict discovers a crime syndicate inside a prison lorded over by an inmate crime boss – and joins in on their nightly heists.

fields.title: The Pursuit
fields.text: Movie In a time of turbulence for the free market system, one economist explores how it has lifted billions out of poverty, and might just save us all.

fields.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
fields.text: Movie When Chris and his son are evicted, they face trying times as a desperate Chris accepts an unpaid internship at a stock brokerage firm.

fields.title: The Push
fields.text: Movie After a snowmobile accident paralyzed him, Grant Korgan became the first athlete with a spinal cord injury to push himself to the South Pole.

fields.title: The Pyramid Code
fields.text: TV Show How was the scientific understanding of the ancients so advanced? A team of experts answers this and other questions in this fascinating series.

fields.title: The Rainbow Troops

fields.title: The Rainmaker

fields.text: Movie This documentary reenacts the experiences of late activist Tsutomu Yamaguchi, a survivor of both atomic bombings on Japan in 1945.

fields.title: Twin Peaks
fields.text: TV Show "Who killed Laura Palmer?" is the question on everyone's lips in a secretive small town, but as an eccentric FBI agent learns, the answer isn't easy.

fields.title: Twinsanity
fields.text: Movie When a yoga enthusiast begins to pull away from her identical twin sister and business partner, their lifelong bond turns deadly.

fields.title: Twirlywoos
fields.text: TV Show The colorful and curious family of Twirlywoos bounces around their boat and visits new places, turning learning into adventures wherever they land.

fields.title: Twisted Trunk, Big Fat Body
fields.text: Movie After terrorists place a bomb inside a toy Lord Ganesha, a child takes off with the dangerous doll, setting it on a course throughout all of Mumbai.

fields.title: Two Graves
fields.text: Movie A doctor and a drug addict kidnap the son of a local gangster, seeking revenge for the death of a loved one.

fields.title: Two Lovers and a Bear
fields.text: Movie A troubled couple living near the North Pole begins a perilous journey south in an attempt to find peace and vanquish ghosts from the past.

fields.title: Tyke Elephant Outlaw
fields.text: Movie This documentary recounts a 1994 incident in Honolulu in which a circus elephant attacked and killed its trainer, then ran loose on the city streets.

fields.title: Tyson
fields.text: Movie In this surprisingly emotional documentary, heavyweight champ Mike Tyson analyzes the controversies surrounding his career and turbulent private life.

fields.title: Ugly
fields.text: Movie When a 10-year-old goes missing while her father, an actor, is out on an audition, the girl's stepfather – Mumbai's police chief – leads the search.

fields.title: Ugly Duckling
fields.text: TV Show Young women face up to their insecurities and circumstances, finding love and laughs along the way. Featuring a different storyline every season.

fields.title: Una
fields.text: Movie A young woman tracks down the older man who preyed on her as a child, forcing them both to confront the damage done by what happened 15 years earlier.

fields.title: Unaccompanied Minors
fields.text: Movie Five disparate kids, snowed in at the airport on Christmas Eve, try to get back to their families and outsmart a disgruntled airport official.

fields.title: Unacknowledged
fields.text: Movie Noted UFO expert Dr. Steven Greer interviews witnesses and presents classified documents concerning the existence of extraterrestrials.

fields.title: Under an Arctic Sky
fields.text: Movie Six fearless surfers travel to the north coast of Iceland to ride waves unlike anything they've ever experienced, captured with high-tech cameras.

fields.title: Under The Skin
fields.text: Movie A seductive alien prowls the streets in search of prey: unsuspecting men who fall under her spell, only to be consumed by a strange liquid pool.

fields.title: Undercover Grandpa
fields.text: Movie Jake's date with his dream girl takes a turn when she disappears, and Jake's grandpa – a former intelligence officer – sets out to find her.

fields.title: Undercover: How to Operate Behind Enemy Lines
fields.text: Movie This World War II-era training film dramatizes how secret agents should act while undercover and how to avoid capture by enemies.

fields.title: Unfinished Song
fields.text: Movie With his wife terminally ill, Arthur's future seems grim. But he learns to find joy in life again when he joins an unconventional church choir.

fields.title: Union Leader
fields.text: Movie Toxic conditions and a corrupt union leader prompt a chemical plant worker and earnest family man to fight for justice for his fellow laborers.

fields.title: Unruly Friends
fields.text: Movie A young woman discovers that familial and psychological traumas can be difficult to leave behind.

fields.title: Up in the Air
fields.text: Movie Ryan Bingham flies around the country firing employees on behalf of companies, but he faces losing the job he savors to recent college grad Natalie.

fields.title: Urvi
fields.text: Movie After getting tricked into working at a brothel, a medical student joins forces with two of her co-workers to fight their unscrupulous exploiters.

fields.title: Used Goods
fields.text: Movie To evade greedy pharmaceutical crooks, a medical scientist disguises himself as a struggling salesman to protect his groundbreaking cancer research.

fields.title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
fields.text: Movie After becoming stranded in the Philippine Sea during World War II, a tenacious Navy crew faces a dire lack of supplies and a string of shark attacks.

fields.title: V for Vendetta
fields.text: Movie A masked freedom fighter known as "V" takes up arms against a totalitarian government and finds an unlikely ally in a young woman.

fields.title: V.R. Troopers
fields.text: TV Show Three friends who study martial arts find themselves defending humanity from a criminal mastermind and his invading army from another dimension.

fields.title: Vantage Point
fields.text: Movie Moments after he arrives in Spain for an antiterrorism summit, U.S. President Ashton is shot.

fields.title: Veerappan
fields.text: Movie A police official assembles an elaborate network of spies and undercover operatives to bring down a ruthless bandit with a private army.

fields.title: Veerey Ki Wedding
fields.text: Movie Quick to throw punches in the name of justice, a young man must find a calmer way to win over the pacifist father of the girl he wishes to marry.

fields.title: Vegas Baby
fields.text: Movie A Las Vegas doctor's controversial online contest sees anxious entrants vie for free in vitro fertilization, a procedure rarely covered by insurance.

fields.title: Viceroy's House
fields.text: Movie As viceroy Lord Mountbatten arrives in Delhi to oversee a transfer of power from Britain to India in 1947, war looms between religious factions.

fields.title: Victor
fields.text: Movie In 1962 Brooklyn, a Puerto Rican teen who joins a gang is seduced by violence and heroin. But can his mother's love and faith in God save him?

fields.title: Viking Destiny
fields.text: Movie Framed for her father’s murder, an exiled Viking princess is guided by the god Odin as she prepares to return to her kingdom and reclaim the throne.

fields.title: Vikings Unearthed
fields.text: Movie Archaeologist Sarah Parcak follows clues to early Viking explorations and discusses just what these notoriously fierce warriors were really like.

fields.title: Vincent N Roxxy
fields.text: Movie In rural Louisiana, a terse loner forges a redemptive bond with a woman he saved from a killer, but a violent past soon catches up with both of them.

fields.title: ViR: The Robot Boy
fields.text: TV Show Humanoid robot boy ViR lives with his inventor, Dr. Prem Sahay, and, with his best friends, is always ready to use his superpowers to save the day.

fields.title: Viswasapoorvam Mansoor
fields.text: Movie When a mother and her daughter arrive to stay in his home in Kerala, a young Muslim man becomes torn between love, faith and clashing political views.

fields.title: Vitti Dandu
fields.text: Movie In a remote village in colonial India, an old man and his grandson display strong differences in their attitudes toward the country's British rulers.

fields.title: Vizontele Tuuba
fields.text: Movie With civil war looming, a TV-obsessed Turkish town is bemused when a bureaucrat and his daughter arrive to modernize their library.

fields.title: Vodka Diaries
fields.text: Movie While investigating a series of murders and the nightclub that links them, a detective’s case takes an alarming turn when his wife goes missing.

fields.title: Vroomiz
fields.text: TV Show For these half-car, half-animal friends, each day in Zippy City is a chance to have fun, be creative and use teamwork to solve difficult problems.

fields.title: VS.
fields.text: Movie A young man in foster care finds his voice in the underground rap battle scene. But when his mother returns, a lifetime of pain comes with her.

fields.title: Waar
fields.text: Movie When Pakistani authorities learn of a looming terrorist strike, they ask a retired intelligence officer to counter the attack before it's too late.

fields.title: Waarrior Savitri
fields.text: Movie In a modern adaptation of a mythological tale, a devoted wife is willing to do whatever it takes to rescue her husband from the clutches of death.

fields.title: Waiting
fields.text: Movie While visiting his comatose wife in the hospital, a serene old professor befriends a vibrant young woman whose husband has also fallen into a coma.

fields.title: Waiting...
fields.text: Movie Employees turn up the antics during an eight-hour shift at the restaurant Shenaniganz when new opportunities call and boredom gets the best of them.

fields.title: Wake Up
fields.text: TV Show After taking the blame for a patient death, an anesthesiologist battling psychiatric trauma fights to stay afloat in the corrupt hospital system.

fields.title: Wakefield
fields.text: Movie An unhappy father and lawyer quits his suburban life and vanishes into the attic above his garage, where he watches his family move on without him.

fields.title: Walk with Me
fields.text: Movie A community of monks in France led by Zen Buddhist master Thich Nhat Hanh offers an intimate glimpse into mindfulness practice and the monastic life.

fields.title: Walking Out
fields.text: Movie A suburban teen goes hunting with his estranged father. When a mishap with a bear occurs, he must his use his survival skills to save them both.

fields.title: War
fields.text: Movie When his partner is killed and all clues point to a notorious assassin, FBI agent Jack Crawford sets out for revenge in this taut action-thriller.

fields.title: War Chhod Na Yaar
fields.text: Movie Set in an India-Pakistan border post, this satirical but thought-provoking comedy about war deals with serious events in a humorous manner.

fields.title: War Horse
fields.text: Movie During World War I, the bond between a young Englishman and his loyal horse, Joey, is tested when Joey is sold to the cavalry and sent to France.

fields.title: War on Everyone
fields.text: Movie Terry and Bob excel at blackmailing small-time crooks. But when the two cops target a big score, they learn not all criminals are easily intimidated.

fields.title: Warda
fields.text: Movie When an aspiring documentarian returns to his hometown to investigate paranormal happenings, his girlfriend's mental health takes a troubling turn.

fields.title: Warehoused
fields.text: Movie A soon-to-be-retiring Mr. Lino teaches 20-something Nin the strict rules of his new warehouse job in this dramedy about the absurdities of work life.

fields.title: Wartime Portraits
fields.text: TV Show Part live-action and part animation, this visually inventive series offers striking portrayals of some of the unsung heroes of World War II.

fields.title: Water & Power: A California Heist
fields.text: Movie California residents and farmers face powerful barons in the struggle to secure water rights in this fresh historical account of profit and interests.

fields.title: Waterschool
fields.text: Movie Six young women, who each live near one of Earth's major rivers, share how the Waterschool environmental education program has impacted their lives.

fields.title: We Are Your Friends
fields.text: Movie An ambitious young DJ who knows how to work a crowd puts everything at risk for a budding relationship with his mentor's girlfriend.

fields.title: We Belong Together
fields.text: Movie A divorced professor shares a night of passion with a troubled student who quickly develops an unhealthy – perhaps deadly – infatuation.

fields.title: We Need to Talk
fields.text: Movie A happy woman's new love is going great, but she needs one thing: divorce papers from her depressed ex. To get them, trickery may be in order.

fields.title: We the Animals
fields.text: Movie A trio of brothers cope with their parents' volatile relationship by running wild and unchecked, and one of them experiences a visceral awakening.

fields.title: We, the Marines
fields.text: Movie Narrated by actor and former Marine Gene Hackman, this documentary showcases the experience of becoming a member of the US Marine Corps.

fields.title: We're No Animals
fields.text: Movie Unhappy with his commercial film work, a jaded Hollywood actor moves to Argentina to participate in an experimental thesis on social philosophy.

fields.title: Weather forecast
fields.text: Movie When a delivery of coffins foreshadows a harsh winter, residents of a retirement home escape their confines and rediscover the world outside.

fields.title: Weeds
fields.text: TV Show A suburban mother starts selling marijuana to her affluent neighbors so she can maintain her comfortable lifestyle after her husband's sudden death.

fields.title: Weeds on Fire
fields.text: Movie In 1980s Hong Kong, a school principal forms a baseball team with an eclectic crew of local students who soon fight their way to the top of the league.

fields.title: Weird Wonders of the World
fields.text: TV Show From animal oddities and bizarre science to medical marvels, scientists and experts examine some of the world's strangest mysteries and phenomena.

fields.title: Welcome 2 Karachi
fields.text: Movie Denied a U.S. visa, two dim Indian men decide to sneak into America on a boat. Fate, however, leaves them stranded on a beach – in Karachi, Pakistan.

fields.title: Welcome to Monster High: The Origin Story
fields.text: Movie Dracula's daughter Draculaura sets out to create a new kind of school where monsters of all kinds can be themselves and have a scary good time.

fields.title: Welcome to New York
fields.text: Movie A lecherous World Bank official sees his reputation crumbling when he's accused of raping a hotel maid during a trip to New York.

fields.title: Welcome to Willits
fields.text: Movie A marijuana farmer's extraterrestrial paranoia creates trouble for a group of young campers who pitch their tent on his land in Northern California.

fields.title: Westerplatte Resists
fields.text: Movie At the onset of World War II, a Polish infantry lacking firepower fight to build a strong defense and protect their peninsula against enemy forces.

fields.title: Westside vs. the World
fields.text: Movie A look into the journey of influential strength coach Louie Simmons and the Westside Barbell gym he founded, evolving the sport of powerlifting.

fields.title: What a Wonderful Family!
fields.text: Movie In a large family living under one roof, a storm brews when the matriarch requests a divorce from her husband on their 50th anniversary.

fields.title: What Happens to My Family
fields.text: TV Show A naïve young woman goes to Istanbul to meet the now-grown boy who jokingly promised to marry her in 11 years after she saved his life as a child.

fields.title: What Is Love?
fields.text: TV Show A 32-year-old romantic looking for a long-term, monogamous relationship meets a handsome bad boy who only believes in one-night stands.

fields.title: What Lies Beneath
fields.text: Movie When Claire Spencer starts hearing ghostly voices and seeing spooky images, her husband tries to reassure her by telling her it's all in her head.

fields.title: What Makes a Psychopath?
fields.text: Movie This wide-ranging documentary examines the behaviors considered in a diagnosis of psychopathy and includes nonviolent, successful figures in history.

fields.title: What Still Remains
fields.text: Movie Struggling to survive alone post-apocalypse, a young woman is offered protection by an unknown man, but his village may not be the haven she imagines.

fields.title: What's Up With Love?
fields.text: Movie A popular high school girl strains her relationship with her close-knit clique when she begins falling for a reclusive, lower-class schoolmate.

fields.title: When Calls the Heart
fields.text: TV Show Leaving behind her upper-crust city roots, a woman journeys west in the early 1900s to become a teacher in a small Canadian mining community.

fields.title: When Hari Got Married
fields.text: Movie A small-town taxi driver is arranged to be married, resulting in an intimate look at the clash between modernity and tradition in India.

fields.title: When Two Worlds Collide
fields.text: Movie This documentary takes a hard look at how indigenous peoples clashed violently with the Peruvian government over land and economics in the Amazon.

fields.title: Where the Money Is
fields.text: Movie Paul Newman proves he's still got prodigious acting chops, playing an aging bank robber who may have one last job in him. Faking a stroke, the incarcerated Newman is transferred to a nursing home and the care of a skeptical nurse.

fields.title: Where's the Money
fields.text: Movie Hunting for a stash of stolen money, a sharp-witted slacker from South Central Los Angeles infiltrates an all-white college fraternity.

fields.title: While We're Young
fields.text: Movie A documentary filmmaker struggling with a creative block meets a vibrant young hipster couple who, initially, bring new energy into his life and work.

fields.title: White Chamber
fields.text: Movie When a civil war ravages the UK, a scientist awakens in a futuristic cell and is tortured by her captor for information she claims she doesn't possess.

fields.title: White Island
fields.text: Movie Returning to Ibiza after several years walking the straight and narrow in London, Connor falls back in with a criminal crowd. It's like he never left.

fields.title: Who the F**k Is That Guy?
fields.text: Movie Take a ride through the life of record exec Michael Alago, a gay Puerto Rican New Yorker who signed a slew of musical acts, including Metallica.

fields.title: Who's That Knocking at My Door?
fields.text: Movie A woman's revelation that she was once raped sends her boyfriend, a reformed street thug, into an emotional and spiritual tailspin.

fields.title: Who's the One
fields.text: TV Show A doctor performs plastic surgery on a fat man who's been jilted, and continues his transformation by turning him into a handsome, desirable man.

fields.title: Why Are We Getting So Fat?
fields.text: Movie A Cambridge geneticist dispels misconceptions about living with obesity and explores why the epidemic continues to expand across the UK and America.

fields.title: Why Knot
fields.text: Movie Pressured by his traditional family to marry, a filmmaker explores the idea of monogamy and the possibility of lifelong union without sexual fidelity.

fields.title: Why We Fight: The Battle of Russia
fields.text: Movie This installment of Frank Capra's acclaimed documentary series highlights the need for a Russo-American alliance to defeat the Nazis.

fields.title: Wild Alaska
fields.text: TV Show The natural bounty of Alaska sustains its diverse species through extreme weather conditions in three seasons, each with its rewards and challenges.

fields.title: Wild Arabia
fields.text: TV Show The widely varied geology and dramatic landscapes in the continental crossroads of Arabia harbors a rich history and an abundance of wildlife.

fields.title: Wild Wild West
fields.text: Movie Armed with an ingenious arsenal, two top-notch government agents are tasked with tracking down a diabolical scientist in this futuristic Western.

fields.title: Wildlife
fields.text: Movie A teen’s life in 1960 Montana grows complicated when his father is fired, his mother returns to work, and the strain on the family begins to show.

fields.title: Williams
fields.text: Movie This inspiring documentary charts the birth of Sir Frank Williams's renowned racing empire – and the near-fatal crash that nearly stalled its future.

fields.title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
fields.text: Movie Zany Willy Wonka causes a stir when he announces that golden tickets hidden inside his candy bars will admit holders into his secret confectionary.

fields.title: Winnie
fields.text: Movie Winnie Mandela speaks about her extraordinary and controversial career, from her early life to her marriage to her ongoing efforts to end apartheid.

fields.title: Winsanity
fields.text: TV Show Actor Donald Faison hosts this game show in which contestants must arrange numerical-based trivia tidbits from largest to smallest for various prizes.

fields.title: Winter of Our Dreams
fields.text: Movie After the death of a long-ago lover, married philanderer Rob tracks down her friend, a drug-addicted prostitute desperate to escape her dead-end life.

fields.title: Winter Sun
fields.text: TV Show Years after ruthless businessmen kill his father and order the death of his twin brother, a modest fisherman adopts a new persona to exact revenge.

fields.title: Winter's Bone
fields.text: Movie In this unflinching noir drama, a resilient teen goes on the trail of her missing, drug-dealing father when his absence threatens the family's safety.

fields.title: Wish I Was Here
fields.text: Movie With his acting career moribund, Aidan Bloom steers a new tack in life, taking over his children's education when private school becomes too costly.

fields.title: Wish Man
fields.text: Movie After surviving a life-threatening accident, a troubled cop finds new purpose when he bonds with a terminally ill little boy. Based on a true story.

fields.title: Withdrawn
fields.text: Movie Unable to pay bills and unwilling to change his slacker lifestyle, twentysomething Aaron hatches a defrauding scheme when he finds a lost credit card.

fields.title: Wolves
fields.text: Movie A promising high school basketball player has his eye on an Ivy League scholarship. But his father's secret addictions could ruin everything.

fields.title: Women Behind Bars
fields.text: TV Show This reality series recounts true stories of women who have been convicted for murder, including an in-depth examination of each crime.

fields.title: Woodstock
fields.text: Movie For the 50th anniversary of the legendary Woodstock festival, organizers and attendees reminisce about one of the defining moments of the 1960s.

fields.title: World Trade Center
fields.text: Movie Working under treacherous conditions, an army of dedicated rescuers struggles to find anyone who survived the World Trade Center's tragic collapse.

fields.title: World's Busiest Cities
fields.text: TV Show From Moscow to Mexico City, three BBC journalists delve into the inner workings of some of the most burgeoning metropolises on Earth.

fields.title: World's Weirdest Homes
fields.text: Movie From a bubble-shaped palace to an island built on plastic bottles, tour the world’s most fantastically bizarre residences.

fields.title: Would You Rather
fields.text: Movie In need of cash to help her sick brother, a young woman agrees to take part in a lethal winner-takes-all parlor game hosted by a sadistic millionaire.

fields.title: Wrong No.
fields.text: Movie Two identical strangers pursue their respective dreams after exchanging lives and getting out from under the thumb of their controlling loved ones.

fields.title: Wrong Side Raju
fields.text: Movie The life of a chauffeur and part-time bootlegger takes a turn toward the dramatic when a girl approaches him to buy illicit alcohol.

fields.title: WWII: Report from the Aleutians
fields.text: Movie Filmmaker John Huston narrates this Oscar-nominated World War II-era film about life among the U.S. soldiers protecting Alaska’s Aleutian Islands.

fields.title: Wyatt Earp
fields.text: Movie Legendary lawman Wyatt Earp is continually at odds with a gang of renegade cowboys, culminating in a fiery showdown with the outlaws at the OK Corral.

fields.title: XX
fields.text: Movie This four-part anthology of short horror films features stories that include some traditional themes but all are shown from a female point of view.

fields.title: XXx
fields.text: Movie A notorious underground rush-seeker deemed untouchable by the law is coerced into cooperating with the government to infiltrate a Russian crime ring.

fields.title: XXX: State of the Union
fields.text: Movie In this action-packed follow-up to XXX, U.S. intelligence officer Augustus Gibbons must thwart a massive conspiracy to overthrow the government.

fields.title: Y Tu Mamá También
fields.text: Movie When rich teens Tenoch and Julio meet the alluring, older Luisa, they try to impress her with stories of a road trip, then convince her to join them.

fields.title: Y.M.I.: Yeh Mera India
fields.text: Movie The lives of a middle-aged soap opera addict, an ambitious career woman, a fervent activist and nine others from different walks of Indian life intersect in Mumbai. But this vibrant melting pot threatens to bubble over with bias and bigotry.

fields.title: Yaadein
fields.text: Movie Two young lovers set out to overcome the obstacles that stand in the way of their marriage, beginning with the objections of the girl's father.

fields.title: Yaara O Dildaara
fields.text: Movie The patriarch of a wealthy family with one industrious son and one who's a playboy arranges for the marriage of one to the woman the other loves.

fields.title: Yamla Pagla Deewana 2
fields.text: Movie Up to his old tricks, con man Dharam poses as a millionaire to get his younger son married to the daughter of a wealthy businessman.

fields.title: Yanda Kartavya Aahe
fields.text: Movie Thanks to an arranged marriage that was designed to make an ailing grandmother happy, newlyweds Rahul and Swati are virtually strangers. Can a four-day honeymoon make a difference when it comes to the couple's feelings about each other?

fields.title: يوم الدين
fields.text: Movie A man cured of leprosy and a young orphan leave their colony for the first time to travel across Egypt, hoping to find the families they lost.

fields.title: Yeh Meri Family
fields.text: TV Show In the summer of 1998, middle child Harshu balances school, family, friendship and other challenges of growing up.

fields.title: Yellowbird
fields.text: Movie An orphaned bird tags along with a flock on their long migration to Africa and becomes a hero when his newfound "family" runs into trouble.

fields.title: Yes or No
fields.text: Movie Traditional girl Pie is initially uncomfortable with her tomboyish new roommate. But as time goes on, she finds herself increasingly attracted to her.

fields.title: Yes or No 2
fields.text: Movie No longer university girls, Kim and Pie face new hurdles in their relationship, including work, new friends and other distractions.

fields.title: Yes or No 2.5
fields.text: Movie Roommates Wine and Pie find their lives turned upside down when two more ladies move in next door, bringing up past heartaches and new attractions.

fields.title: Yo-Kai Watch
fields.text: TV Show Nate frees a mythical being trapped in a magic capsule, and the two new friends have adventures with all sorts of troublesome supernatural creatures.

fields.title: Yo-Kai Watch: The Movie
fields.text: Movie Nate's special Yo-Kai Watch is missing. He travels back in time to meet the watch's inventor, his grandfather. Together, they must restore history!

fields.title: Yoga Hosers
fields.text: Movie With an all-important high school party at stake, two teen yoga fanatics enlist a man hunter to help fight an army of monsters created by Nazis.

fields.title: Yoko
fields.text: TV Show Friends Mai, Oto and Vik's games at the park become magical adventures, thanks to Yoko, who can turn playgrounds into spaceships and camping sites.

fields.title: Yoko and His Friends
fields.text: Movie Vik meets new friends in a new city, where they go on exciting adventures together with a magical being. But soon, his family must move again.

fields.title: YOM
fields.text: TV Show With the mind of a human being, and the body of whichever animal he chooses to be, a young boy protects the world from danger.

fields.title: You Can Tutu
fields.text: Movie A gifted young ballet dancer struggles to find her footing in an uptight ballet school that brings her and her family to a brand-new neighborhood.

fields.title: You Can’t Fight Christmas
fields.text: Movie After stepping in to revitalize his family's hotel, a money-minded businessman clashes with the hotel's cheery, Christmas-loving decorator.

fields.title: You Carry Me
fields.text: Movie A soap opera producer, director and makeup artist each face wrenching family turmoil, from teen rebellion and marital infidelity to Alzheimer's.

fields.title: You Changed My Life
fields.text: Movie Laida and Miggy think they've found perfect happiness with each other, until their burgeoning careers force them into a long-distance relationship.

fields.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
fields.text: Movie An Israeli counterterrorism soldier with a secretly fabulous ambition to become a Manhattan hairstylist will do anything to make his dreams come true.

fields.title: Young Adult
fields.text: Movie When a divorced writer gets a letter from an old boyfriend announcing his wife's had a baby, she returns to her hometown to reconnect with her ex.

fields.title: Young Tiger
fields.text: Movie Aided only by a tough female police officer, a Hong Kong taxi driver tries to escape from gangsters pursuing incriminating evidence left in his cab.

fields.title: Yours, Mine and Ours
fields.text: Movie When a father of eight and a mother of 10 prepare to wed, the couple's children attempt to sabotage the union in this remake of a 1968 comedy.

fields.title: اشتباك
fields.text: Movie Amid the tumult following Egyptian President Morsi's ouster, demonstrators from divergent backgrounds are brought together inside a police truck.

fields.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
fields.text: TV Show Now that he's discovered the Pendulum Summoning technique, Yuya's dream of becoming the greatest "dueltainer" is in reach – but it won't be easy!

fields.title: Yunus Emre
fields.text: TV Show During the Mongol invasions, Yunus Emre leaves his home to travel across the Ottoman Empire, defying hardships and temptations to become a dervish.

fields.title: Zak Storm
fields.text: TV Show Teen surfer Zak Storm is mysteriously transported to the Bermuda Triangle, where he becomes the captain of a magical ship full of misfits.

fields.title: Zed Plus
fields.text: Movie A philandering small-town mechanic's political ambitions are sparked when the visiting prime minister mistakenly grants him special security clearance.

fields.title: Zenda
fields.text: Movie A change in the leadership of a political party sparks bitter conflict and the party's division into two rival factions.

fields.title: Zindagi Gulzar Hai
fields.text: TV Show Strong-willed, middle-class Kashaf and carefree, wealthy Zaroon meet in college, but before love can take root, they each have some growing up to do.

fields.title: Zinzana
fields.text: Movie Recovering alcoholic Talal wakes up inside a small-town police station cell, where he's subject to the mind games of a psychotic sadist.

fields.title: Zodiac
fields.text: Movie A political cartoonist, a crime reporter and a pair of cops investigate San Francisco's infamous Zodiac Killer in this thriller based on a true story.

fields.title: Zombie Dumb
fields.text: TV Show While living alone in a spooky town, a young girl befriends a motley crew of zombie children with diverse personalities.

fields.title: Zombieland
fields.text: Movie Looking to survive in a world taken over by zombies, a dorky college student teams with an urban roughneck and a pair of grifter sisters.

fields.title: Zoom
fields.text: Movie Dragged from civilian life, a former superhero must train a new crop of youthful saviors when the military preps for an attack by a familiar villain.

fields.title: Zubaan
fields.text: Movie A scrappy but poor boy worms his way into a tycoon's dysfunctional family, while facing his fear of music and the truth about his past.
